title: Pot o' Gold 1941 | James Stewart, Paulette Goddard (Musical, Romance) Movie | with Subtitles

sources.title: Pot o' Gold 1941 | James Stewart, Paulette Goddard (Musical, Romance) Movie | with Subtitles
sources.description:
Jimmy, a bankrupt music store owner, goes to work with his uncle, the owner of a food factory. goes to work with his uncle in his factory. He befriends an Irish family who happens to be his uncle's enemy.  And so, Jimmy strives to unite the two parties, and take the heart of the beautiful Molly in the process.
 
Original title: Pot o' Gold (1941)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/udzLFmXUseQ

Director: George Marshall
Writers: Walter DeLeon, Andrew Bennison
Actors: James Stewart, Paulette Goddard, Horace Heidt 
Genres: Classic, Musical, Comedy, Romance

This film has subtitles in many languages, and dubbed audio in Italian & Spanish.

Summary: Welcoming a New Musician in a Town, Court Case, Tomato-Throwing Incident, Singing and Performance Discussion, Fairy Tales and Dream-like Places, Radio Show and New Orchestra, Announcement of Cash Prize, Saving a Radio Show from Bankruptcy, Television Show Success and Contest Winner.
